data.comment: The match is underway at Cardiff City Stadium.
Sheffield Wed take a 0-1 lead thanks to Josh Windass.
In the minute 44, Sheffield Wed take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Jordan Rhodes.
The first half has been concluded at Cardiff City Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Cardiff.
In the minute 58, Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a first substitution, with Robert Glatzel replacing Joe Ralls.
Josh Murphy is replacing Junior Hoilett for the home team.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Lee Tomlin replacing Sheyi Ojo.
In the minute 65, The away team replace Jordan Rhodes with Adam Reach.
The away team have replaced Josh Windass with Elias Kachunga. This is the second substitution made today by Garry Monk.
Massimo Luongo for Sheffield Wed has been booked by Andy Madley and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Sheffield Wed make their third substitution with Liam Palmer replacing Matthew Penney.
